faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en:
Students are able to understand basic knowledge, principles and implementation possibilities of social entrepreneurship. The course will be structured around three elements that will be interwoven throughout:
1.The field of social entrepreneurship. 
2.The players and business structures used by social entrepreneurs.
3.The mechanics, tensions, and realities of starting and/or managing a social enterprise.
description.et:
Õppijad omandavad alusteadmised sotsiaalse ettevõtluse olemusest, põhimõtetest ja rakendusvõimalustest. Kursuse jooksul käsitletakse kolme omavahel lõimunud teemat:
1.sotsiaalse ettevõtluse tööpõld
2.sotsiaalses ettevõtluses osalejad ja ettevõtluse ning äri oskused, mida kasutatakse sotsiaalses ettevõtluses
3.mehhanismid, probleemid ja tegelikkus sotsiaalse ettevõtte käivitamisel või selle arendamisel.

objectives.en: Students are able to understand basic knowledge, principles and implementation possibilities of social entrepreneurship.
objectives.et: Õppijad omandavad alusteadmised sotsiaalse ettevõtluse olemusest, põhimõtetest ja rakendusvõimalustest.

learning_outcomes.en:
After passing the course the student:
* Has gained an understanding of the field of social entrepreneurship and understand many of the opportunities, challenges and issues faced by social entrepreneurs.
* Is competent to choose between different types of  enterprises and business models; having long-term goal of sustainable social enterprise and being able to evaluate its impact for the society.
* Is able to analyse and design entrepreneurial process, its prerequisites and components.
* Is able to implement innovative processes for his/her projects of study field, including development of product and/or service.
* Is able to find, create, analyse and communicate business or/and project idea.
* Is able to compose business concept for a social enterprise.
learning_outcomes.et:
* Mõistab sotsiaalse ettevõtluse olemust ning näeb sotsiaalse ettevõtluse rakendamiseks võimalusi ja väljakutseid.
* Suudab valida erinevate ettevõtlusvormide ja ärimudelite vahel tagamaks sotsiaalse ettevõtte jätkusuutlikus ning suudab hinnata selle mõju ühiskonnas.
* Oskab analüüsida ja kavandada ettevõtlusprotsessi, selle eeldusi ning komponente. 
* Oskab  rakendada innovatsiooniprotsesse oma erialaprojektides, sh toote/teenuse arendamine.
* Oskab leida, luua, analüüsida ja kommunikeerida äri- ja/või projektiideed.
* Suudab koostada sotsiaalse ettevõtluse ärikontseptsiooni.

grade_evaluation.et: Points in total: Weekly Tasks (parts of Social Entrepreneurship business concept), Team Assessment. Most of the weeks are team-focused. To pass the course, 75% from all points must be gathered. Those achieving less will have a written exam. Not sending the homework on time reduces 3% from the final grade.

description.et: Generating Social Enterprise idea and problem. Developing Social Enterprise idea, problem, individual interest.
Social problems. Social enterprise values. How to turn the social problem into an opportunity
Factors determining success in social enterprise: bringing together social and commercial objectives. The Opportunity.

.A/ The future for social enterprise.
B/ Business Model & Income Streams. Part 1.

A/ Starting a social enterprise and the importance of communications in managing relationships with stakeholders, target groups/clients
B/ Business model & Income Streams. Part 2.
Video presentation of social enterprise business concept.
